item.title: Tips to live by
item.description: It’s not about being right nor prove others wrong Corollary 1: if it’s wrong but it works, then it’s not wrong. Corollary 2: if you’re right but it doesn’t change the outcome, then it doesn’t matter. Corollary 3: if you’re right, but it doesn’t work, then you’re wrong. Corollary 4: if you prove someone else wrong, but their answer works and yours doesn’t, then they’re right and you’re wrong. Corollary 5: if you prove someone’s solution to be wrong even though it does provide value, then you have not yet provided any value until you propose something better.
